  • java.lang.Object

public class PersistentAnnotation
extends Object
    An Annotation class to store annotation in a database

    florian

      • deleteExportedTextFiles

        public int deleteExportedTextFiles()
                            throws ViewerConfigurationException
        Deletes exported JSON annotations from a related record's data folder. Should be called when deleting this annotation.
        Returns:
        Number of deleted files
        Throws:
        ViewerConfigurationException - if any.

      • delete

        public boolean delete()
               throws DAOException,
                      ViewerConfigurationException
        Deletes this annotation from the database. If successful, deletes any JSON files in the file system and creates a re-indexing job.
        Returns:
        Throws:
        DAOException
        ViewerConfigurationException

      • getReviewStatus

        public CampaignRecordStatistic.CampaignRecordStatus getReviewStatus()
                                                             throws DAOException
        Find the record status of the generator campaign and pi. If the annotation does not belong to a campaign, return CampaignRecordStatus.FINISHED
        Returns:
        The review status for this annotation
        Throws:
        DAOException
